languages.text: "И как бы выглядели молитвы? "Да не нарушим мы сроки отправки десятины, да незыблем будет ранг Солюцио-как-там-его..." Хотя что это я — ты же, наверное, и правда так молишься".

traits.locale_text: "И как бы выглядели молитвы? "Да не нарушим мы сроки отправки десятины, да незыблем будет ранг Солюцио-как-там-его..." Хотя что это я — ты же, наверное, и правда так молишься".

languages.text: "And what kind of prayers would people say here then? 'May we never miss our tithe shipment date, may we forever abide by the grade Solutio Whateveris...' I shouldn't even joke about it — I bet that's exactly how you pray."
languages.original_text: "И как бы выглядели молитвы? "Да не нарушим мы сроки отправки десятины, да незыблем будет ранг Солюцио-как-там-его..." Хотя что это я — ты же, наверное, и правда так молишься".

languages.text: 「それでは、ここで一体どんな祈りが捧げられるというんだ？『租税の納付期限を逃しませんように。永久にソルーティオ・何とか等級でありますように』とかか？冗談にもならんな。本当にそんな風に祈っているのではないかとすら思う」
languages.original_text: "And what kind of prayers would people say here then? 'May we never miss our tithe shipment date, may we forever abide by the grade Solutio Whateveris...' I shouldn't even joke about it — I bet that's exactly how you pray."

traits.locale_text: 「それでは、ここで一体どんな祈りが捧げられるというんだ？『租税の納付期限を逃しませんように。永久にソルーティオ・何とか等級でありますように』とかか？冗談にもならんな。本当にそんな風に祈っているのではないかとすら思う」

languages.text: "Und was sollen die Leute hier für Gebete sprechen? 'Mögen wir niemals den Termin unseres Zehnts verpassen und ewig den Grad des Solutio Was-auch-immer-is beibehalten ...' Ich sollte nicht darüber scherzen, vermutlich beten sie tatsächlich so."
languages.original_text: "And what kind of prayers would people say here then? 'May we never miss our tithe shipment date, may we forever abide by the grade Solutio Whateveris...' I shouldn't even joke about it — I bet that's exactly how you pray."

traits.locale_text: "Und was sollen die Leute hier für Gebete sprechen? 'Mögen wir niemals den Termin unseres Zehnts verpassen und ewig den Grad des Solutio Was-auch-immer-is beibehalten ...' Ich sollte nicht darüber scherzen, vermutlich beten sie tatsächlich so."

languages.text: « Et quel genre de prières les gens diraient, si c'était le cas ? "Faites que nous ne soyons jamais en retard pour payer la dîme, que nous respections toujours le niveau du Solutio-machin-truc..." Je ne devrais même pas en rire, je parie que c'est exactement comme ça que vous priez. »
languages.original_text: "And what kind of prayers would people say here then? 'May we never miss our tithe shipment date, may we forever abide by the grade Solutio Whateveris...' I shouldn't even joke about it — I bet that's exactly how you pray."

traits.locale_text: « Et quel genre de prières les gens diraient, si c'était le cas ? "Faites que nous ne soyons jamais en retard pour payer la dîme, que nous respections toujours le niveau du Solutio-machin-truc..." Je ne devrais même pas en rire, je parie que c'est exactement comme ça que vous priez. »

languages.text: «¿Y qué clase de oraciones se rezarían aquí? "Que nunca se nos pase la fecha del diezmo, que siempre tengamos bastante para el grado Solutio Muchicientis...". No sé ni por qué lo digo en broma; seguro que es así como rezan de verdad».
languages.original_text: "And what kind of prayers would people say here then? 'May we never miss our tithe shipment date, may we forever abide by the grade Solutio Whateveris...' I shouldn't even joke about it — I bet that's exactly how you pray."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y qué clase de oraciones se rezarían aquí? "Que nunca se nos pase la fecha del diezmo, que siempre tengamos bastante para el grado Solutio Muchicientis...". No sé ni por qué lo digo en broma; seguro que es así como rezan de verdad».

languages.text: “那如果有了法典，这里的人该怎么祈祷才好？‘愿我们神圣的什一税永远不会错过装船日期，愿我们永远遵循什么红衣主教的戒律什么什么的……’噢，我不该拿这个开玩笑。我敢说，你平时肯定就是这么祈祷的。”
languages.original_text: "And what kind of prayers would people say here then? 'May we never miss our tithe shipment date, may we forever abide by the grade Solutio Whateveris...' I shouldn't even joke about it — I bet that's exactly how you pray."

traits.locale_text: “那如果有了法典，这里的人该怎么祈祷才好？‘愿我们神圣的什一税永远不会错过装船日期，愿我们永远遵循什么红衣主教的戒律什么什么的……’噢，我不该拿这个开玩笑。我敢说，你平时肯定就是这么祈祷的。”

languages.text: "Bir de burada ne duası ediyorlardı acaba? 'Aşar sevkiyat tarihini kaçırmamıza izin verme, Solutio Bilmemneis kademesine uymamıza yardım et' filan mı? Gerçi şakaya vurmamak lazım, muhtemelen böyle dua ediyorlardı."
languages.original_text: "And what kind of prayers would people say here then? 'May we never miss our tithe shipment date, may we forever abide by the grade Solutio Whateveris...' I shouldn't even joke about it — I bet that's exactly how you pray."

traits.locale_text: "Bir de burada ne duası ediyorlardı acaba? 'Aşar sevkiyat tarihini kaçırmamıza izin verme, Solutio Bilmemneis kademesine uymamıza yardım et' filan mı? Gerçi bunun şakası yapılmaz, muhtemelen böyle dua ediyorlardı."

languages.original_text: "And what kind of prayers would people say here then? 'May we never miss our tithe shipment date, may we forever abide by the grade Solutio Whateveris...' I shouldn't even joke about it — I bet that's exactly how you pray."
